Dans cette partie et avant de passer à l'exercice 10, nous allons faire la section 3.3 sur la régression logistique pénélisée du [tutoriel de Laurent Rouvière](https://lrouviere.github.io/TUTO_GRANDE_DIM/correction/03-ridge-lasso.html)





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```

Attachement du package : 'dplyr'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Les objets suivants sont masqués depuis 'package:stats':

    filter, lag
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Les objets suivants sont masqués depuis 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(glmnet)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Le chargement a nécessité le package : Matrix
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Loaded glmnet 4.1-8
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ad.data <- readr::read_delim(
  "~/Documents/1_Projet/Perso/Statistique_en_grande_dimension/data/internet+advertisements/ad.data",
  delim = ",",
  col_names = FALSE,
  na = c("?"),
  trim_ws = TRUE,
  col_types = readr::cols(X1559 = readr::col_factor())
) |>
  rename(Y = X1559)  
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(ad.data$Y)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   ad. nonad. 
   459   2820 
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(is.na(ad.data))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2729
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
var.na <- apply(is.na(ad.data),2,any)
names(ad.data)[var.na]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "X1" "X2" "X3" "X4"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ind.na <- apply(is.na(ad.data),1,any)
sum(ind.na)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 920
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ad.data1 <- ad.data[,var.na==FALSE]
dim(ad.data1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 3279 1555
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(is.na(ad.data1))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
X.ad <- model.matrix(Y~.,data=ad.data1)[,-1]
Y.ad <- ad.data1$Y
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
lasso.cv <- cv.glmnet(X.ad,Y.ad,family="binomial",alpha=1)
plot(lasso.cv)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Exercice_09Bonus_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
